review: It is a good device for those that don't mind its lack of versatility.  I got used to having a laptop for streaming on my TV and what you can watch on a laptop far outstrips what you can do with any streaming device like the fire stick.  Plus I didn't like that fact I couldn't navigate to channels websites like CBS to watch shows there for free.  But if you already have or don't mind paying subscriptions to services like Hulu then I could be a good fit for you.I did like the remote and ease of setup it was pretty much plug and play.
